Growwwwwl... times are tough, but I must be smart!
Growwwwwl... the hunt is on, but we must be smart!
Growwllllllll... the hunt is tough, but I will adapt!
Growwwwwl... the hunt is tricky, but I must be smart!
Grrrrrrr... the hunt is tough, but I must be wise.
Growwllllllll... the hunt is tough, but I will endure!
Growwllllllll... The hunt is tough, but I will adapt!
Growwllllllll... the hunt is tough, but I will adapt!
